translated: At that time, in the assembly there was a bodhisattva-mahāsattva named Inconceivable Light King, who immediately rose from his seat, looked at the great assembly of bodhisattvas, and said to the assembly:

translated: If there are people who uphold, recite, and explain this 'Sutra on the Comparison of the Merits of All Buddha Lands' for others, when their lives end, the Buddhas, Tathagatas of the Ganges sands in the ten directions, will all appear before them and fulfill all their wishes.
